Class org.tum.opensim.somview.UMatrix extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

displayDots

boolean displayDots
specifies whether or not black dots should be displayed on nodes

quality

int quality
quality specifies the pixel size of each hexagon

zoomScale

double zoomScale
The scale variable scales the buffered image to allow for zooming.

hitCountScaling

double hitCountScaling
This variable allows the user to scale the hit count circle to a reasonable size.

normedZoomScale

double normedZoomScale
The normScale is the ratio of zooming scale to quality. Using the normScale instead of the scale means no zooming occurs when the quality is changed.

colorModel

int colorModel
Specifies whether the uMatrix is shown in a greyscale or a color map.

hexagons

Hexagon[][] hexagons
a two-dimensional array which contains all hexagons in the umatrix

hexFactory

HexagonFactory hexFactory
the hexagon factory for this umatrix

interpolateDistanceNodes

boolean interpolateDistanceNodes
specifies whether the hexagon for a node should stay white or interpolate the value of its neighbors

som

SOMMap som
the associated som for which the umatrix is shown

currentTime

double currentTime
This variable is needed for the synchronization of trajectories and movement.

trajectories

java.util.LinkedList<E> trajectories
a list of trajectories that can be shown on top of the umatrix

observers

java.util.List<E> observers
Observers - will be notified if anything important in the uMatrix changes. For example: new SOM was loaded

progressListeners

java.util.List<E> progressListeners
Progress event listeners Will be notified if the umatrix is working on anything that might take longer

contourLineDists

java.util.List<E> contourLineDists
Values at which the contourlines will be painted

cLineThickness

double cLineThickness
Thickness of the contourlines

contourlinesActive

boolean contourlinesActive
State of the contourlines

bufferUMatrix

java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferUMatrix
Buffer for the umatrix => only draw the buffer at every redraw and rerender the umatrix only when necessary

bufferTrajectories

java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferTrajectories
Buffer for the trajectories => only draw the buffer at every redraw and rerender the trajectories only when necessary

bufferCombine

java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferCombine
Contains the combination of umatrix and trajectory buffer
